meanings.definition: A survey or review of a past course of events or period of time.
meanings.sent1: In retrospect, I realized how much I had grown over the years.
meanings.sent2: Looking back in retrospect, the old photographs brought back memories.
meanings.sent3: In a humorous retrospect, my mom found my old diary and laughed at my teenage drama.
meanings.sent4: The retrospective of my childhood felt like flipping through a photo album of adventures.
meanings.sent5: The retrospective of my mistakes was a valuable lesson in learning from the past.

meanings.definition: To look back on or review past events or situations.
meanings.sent1: She likes to retrospect on her childhood memories during quiet evenings.
meanings.sent2: I often retrospect on my decisions to see where I could have done better.
meanings.sent3: As a joke, we retrospect on the time we tried to bake a cake and failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: Retrospecting on the past year, I realized how much I have achieved.
meanings.sent5: He would retrospect on his mistakes to avoid repeating them in the future.
